duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive Business to Business sales efforts.
Create and prioritize opportunities, managing multiple touch points effectively.
Engage in face-to-face networking to rapidly build a portfolio of clients.
Conduct critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems related to promoting and selling products and services.
Maintain client relationships to generate future revenue growth.
Communicate compellingly and persistently to bring concepts to life and maintain a position at the top of the sales leaderboard.
